full_text: RT @PedderSophie: Make no mistake. Le Pen's foreign-policy thinking, from hostility to the Franco-German axis to alliances with Hungary, Po…

retweeted_status.full_text:
Make no mistake. Le Pen's foreign-policy thinking, from hostility to the Franco-German axis to alliances with Hungary, Poland (+ Russia), are an ill-disguised attempt to dismantle the EU project of integration from within @TheEconomist 

https://t.co/Zc61atEO5i

localize.full_text: RT @PedderSophie: 間違いない。ルペンの外交政策は、独仏軸への敵対からハンガリーやポーランドのような国との同盟に至るまで、様々である。
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:

localize.full_text: RT @PedderSophie: 请不要搞错。勒庞的外交政策思维，从对法德轴心的敌意到与匈牙利、波尔图的联盟。
